items.text: CS/ECE 476 – ADVANCED COMPUTER NETWORKING Ryan Gambord Winter 2025
Overview Course Name Advance Computer Networking

Homework and Lab Assignments 30%
Quizzes 20%

Final project grading information not found.
Final exam grading information not found.

Evaluation of Student Performance Category Portion of Grade
Homework and Lab Assignments 30%
Quizzes 20%
Programming Project 20%
Project Presentation 15%
Topic Survey Presentation 15%
Subject to change in order to support desired learning and assessment outcomes. Letter Grade Performance Description
A 90 –100% “Exceptional”
B 80 – 90% “Superior”
C 70 – 80% “Average”
D 60 – 70% “Inferior”
F 0 - 60% “Failure”
Where applicable, ± letter grades are applied to the upper and lower third of each listed range.
Learning Resources 1. J. F. Kurose and K. W. Ross, Computer Networking: A Top-Down Approach, 7th ed. Pearson, 2017. (optional)
2. Analysis of Computer and Communication Networks, by Fayez Gebali, Springer (optional) 3. Computer Communication Networks, by N. F. Mir, Prentice Hall (optional)
Academic Calendar All students are subject to the registration and refund deadlines as stated in the Academic Calendar: https://registrar.oregonstate.edu/osu-academic-calendar 2
